Description: Arabian Cement Co (known as: ACC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. ACC operates within the Materials sector focusing on Construction Materials. It has Companies operating across Jordan, Saudi Arabia and Bahrain. ACC is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1955.
